tickets.title: Cannot access development environment
tickets.description: Getting 403 error when trying to deploy to staging environment. Need immediate access to complete release.
tickets.mockSolution: Reset deployment credentials and update service principal permissions

tickets.title: How to configure SSL certificates
tickets.description: Need help setting up HTTPS for new microservice. Looking for step-by-step configuration guide.
tickets.mockSolution: SSL configuration guide with Azure Key Vault integration steps

tickets.title: Database connection timeout
tickets.description: Application experiencing intermittent database timeouts during peak hours. Performance degradation observed.
tickets.mockSolution: Optimize connection pool settings and implement retry logic

tickets.title: User account locked out
tickets.description: Multiple users reporting account lockouts after password reset. Need immediate resolution.
tickets.mockSolution: Unlock accounts and review authentication policy settings

tickets.title: API integration failing
tickets.description: Third-party API integration returning 500 errors. Service disruption affecting customer workflows.
tickets.mockSolution: Implement circuit breaker pattern and fallback mechanism

tickets.title: Security vulnerability report
tickets.description: Potential security vulnerability detected in authentication module. Requires immediate assessment.
tickets.mockSolution: Security patch deployment and vulnerability assessment

tickets.title: How to implement caching
tickets.description: Looking for best practices on implementing Redis caching for improved performance.
tickets.mockSolution: Redis caching implementation guide with Azure Cache patterns

tickets.title: Model accuracy degradation
tickets.description: ML model showing decreased accuracy over past week. Need analysis and retraining recommendations.
tickets.mockSolution: Trigger model retraining pipeline with updated dataset

tickets.title: Generate monthly report
tickets.description: Need automated monthly performance report for executive review. Include KPIs and trends.
tickets.mockSolution: Generate comprehensive monthly report with visualizations

tickets.title: Workflow automation setup
tickets.description: Configure automated workflow for code deployment pipeline. Include approval gates and notifications.
tickets.mockSolution: Setup CI/CD pipeline with Azure DevOps integration

scenarios.name: Peak Load Simulation
scenarios.description: Simulate high-volume ticket processing during peak hours

scenarios.name: Critical Incident Response
scenarios.description: Test escalation and coordination for critical security incident

scenarios.name: Knowledge Base Validation
scenarios.description: Validate knowledge retrieval accuracy and relevance

scenarios.name: End-to-End Workflow
scenarios.description: Complete ticket lifecycle from triage to resolution
